name.ja: パスワードジェネレータ

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Password generator and  check the strength of password.
short.ja: パスワードジェネレータ、パスワードの強度を確認できる
short.ru: Генератор паролей и проверка его прочности.
short.zh_CN: 密码生成器并检查密码的强度.
short.zh_TW: 密碼生成器並檢查密碼的强度.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This password generator extension tool also includes a feature to check the strength of passwords. When a user generates a password, the tool automatically evaluates its strength and displays the result.

The evaluation of password strength includes several criteria such as length, variety of characters used, randomness, and avoidance of common words or patterns. Taking these criteria into account, the tool categorizes passwords as weak, moderate, strong, etc., and presents this assessment to the user.

For weak passwords, the tool encourages users to generate stronger passwords. Even for strong passwords, it may suggest additional security measures such as regular changes or two-factor authentication.

Assessing password strength is an important indicator for users to generate secure passwords and properly safeguard their accounts. Through this feature, users are provided with specific means to enhance the security of their accounts.
